data.title: Unit 3 : Plants
Parts of a Plant
data.rubric: Click on any of the labels to know more about each part of the plant.
data.text: Seeds are made and stored in the flower.
The stem supports the other parts of the plant.
The stem also moves water to other parts of the plant.
Food is made in the leaves for the plant to live and grow.
The roots support the plant in the ground.
The roots take in water from the ground for the plant.
